DOC.brief_title: TACT-NAGOYA : Therapeutic Angiogenesis Using Cell Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Subjects chronic limb ischemia , include rest pain , nonhealing ischemic ulcer , , candidate nonsurgical surgical revascularisation . Poorly control diabetes mellitus ( hemoglobin A1c [ HbA1c ] > 6.5 % proliferative retinopathy ) Evidence malignant disorder past 5 year Subjects survive 1 year complication Malignant rheumatic arthritis
